statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE account_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND alert_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fraud' AND alert_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 100 AND alert_type = 'Fraud';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND suspicious_flag = TRUE;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE note = 'refund' OR detail_description LIKE '%suspicious%';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
